name: World32 snapshot a1.4_02
description:
World32 is now an open-world game! The world has a size of (2^32 * 2^32) * 19 tiles (it's big!). You can discover the landscapes and build your own world!

The game is for free. Press only "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" above the "2.00$" line. But you can donate to advance the work :)

Changes:

-added wood block
-added brick
-added build tab
-added train tab
-added items tab
-changed inventory slot texture
-can generate lava in mountain landscapes
-can generate grass in oasis landscapes
-can generate palm trees, wedge stones and sticks in island landscapes
-added rails
-added background music
-added shelf to store items
-added cotton and cotton bush(can spawn in oasis landscape)
-save options

Control:

WASD - walk

LEFT,RIGHT,UP,DOWN - dismantle

E - inventory / left inventory
